SEARCH
Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl

Class GL13C

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.GL10C
overrungl.opengl.GL11C
overrungl.opengl.GL12C
overrungl.opengl.GL13C
Direct Known Subclasses:
GL13, GL14C
public sealed class GL13C extends GL12C permits GL13, GL14C
GL13C relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GL13C refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment.
Programs can only use GL13C when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
The OpenGL 1.3 forward compatible functions.

These extensions are promoted in this version:

  • GL_ARB_multisample
  • GL_ARB_multitexture
  • GL_ARB_texture_border_clamp
  • GL_ARB_texture_compression
  • GL_ARB_texture_cube_map
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
